name: Infrastructure Development Revision
description: Provisions related to development of infrastructure, including but not limited to roads, bridges, plumbing and power.City roads pay 4 per asphalt placed.Federal highways pay 1.5 per stone and 3 per asphalt placed.

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Constructed</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Constructed</ecoicon>: Was the block constructed or deconstructed?

Location.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Action Location</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Action Location</ecoicon>: The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Title: Chat Query

properties.Title: Stone Ramp (Tracking)
properties.UserDescription: Track placement of stone ramps. Note that the logic here is specifically designed to counteract a game bug with stone ramps (issue #19473). Only applies for federal roads as capitol should not have need of ramps.
